thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Paddington - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: You get what you pay for!
thread.title_full: You get what you pay for! - Review of Point A Hotel, London Paddington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Andrew W
title: You get what you pay for!
text:
Stayed for just one night, as needed a place to get my head down after a later night with work and before an early morning start at work.
I had been told the Tune was great value for money, comfortable, essentially 'no/few frills' and clean. Wasn't disappointed. Comfortable bed. Good shower. Clean room.
If you're not familiar with the concept, you pay more for the additional things you want in your room (hair dryer etc). I was only staying for a place to sleep so was perfect. Excellent price tag. The only downside for me was that even though I arrived and left in the dark, a window would have been nice (my room was in the basement; I am sure there are rooms with windows!)
